name: Up the Light
description:
Up the Light follows a small animal hiding from a storm in a lighthouse. As the animal makes its way up the lighthouse, a story is revealed, and the animal becomes attune with nature.  

  • Control the game with the arrow keys or WASD
  • Interact with yellow objects as you climb the lighthouse to progress the story. 

Up the Light is a short, 5-minute playable story made with Bitsy. This is my third project in Bitsy, the others being Duck Goose and Overnight. I'm really proud of this story, the graphics, and the atmosphere of the whole experience. I'm so excited to finally share this project with you all!

Up the Light was made possible by:

  • Bitsy by Adam Le Doux
  • Bitsy Audio by Mark Wonnacott
  • Beepbox by John Nesky

The hacks:

  • Directional Avatar by Sean S. LeBlanc
  • Transparent Sprites by Sean S. LeBlanc

And the help of the Bitsy Discord

  • Access a downloadable version of the soundtrack song "thunder in space" below :)

You can contact me at @exhausted.boi on instagram, or feel free to chat with me in the comments! Thank you for playing!
